text: Despicable Me 3 is a 2017 American 3D computer-animated action comedy movie released by Illumination Entertainment and Universal Pictures. It is the third main installment, fourth overall movie in the Despicable Me movie series and the sequel to Despicable Me 2 (2013). The movie is directed by Pierre Coffin and Kyle Balda, co-directed by Eric Guillon and written by Cinco Paul and Ken Daurio. It stars Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Trey Parker, Miranda Cosgrove, Steve Coogan, Jenny Slate, Dana Gaier, and Julie Andrews. Despicable Me 3 was released on June 14, 2017, at the Annecy International Animated Film Festival, and had a theatrical release in the United States on July 30, 2017, by Universal Pictures in 3D, RealD 3D, Dolby Cinema and IMAX 3D. A spin-off and prequel, Minions: The Rise of Gru was released on July 1, 2022.https://thedigitalwise.com/2020/02/27/minions-the-rise-of-gru-premiere- date-cast-members-storyline-and-more/ ==Sequel== A sequel, Despicable Me 4, was released on July 3, 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2017 comedy movies Category:2017 computer-animated movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:American 3D animated movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Despicable Me Category:Illumination movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:2010s 3D movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies set in Europe Category:Movies set in 1987 Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies directed by Pierre Coffin Category:Movies directed by Kyle Balda
title: Despicable Me 3
